coreAtributes.name: Eternal Virgin Ring
coreAtributes.description: A cursed mystical ring that restores virginities when equipped.

replacementText.playerSelf:
You slide the ring over your finger. #IF (pc.hasPenis()&&!pc.isPenisVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#pc.setPenisVirgin(1)]ifies you, restoring mental innocence and penile virginity! #ENDIF #IF (pc.hasVagina()&&!pc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#pc.setVaginaVirgin(1)]ifies you, restoring mental innocence and hymen! #ENDIF #IF (!pc.isFaceVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#pc.setFaceVirgin(1)]ifies you, restoring mental innocence and oral virginity! #ENDIF #IF (!pc.isAssVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#pc.setAssVirgin(1)]ifies you, restring mental innocence and anal virginity! #ENDIF
replacementText.playerNPC:
You slide the ring over [npc.name]'s finger. #IF (npc.hasPenis()&&!npc.isPenisVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#npc.setPenisVirgin(1)]ifies [npc.namePos], restoring mental innocence and penile virginity! #ENDIF #IF (npc.hasVagina()&&!npc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#npc.setVaginaVirgin(1)]ifies [npc.namePos], restores [npc.her] mental innocence and hymen! #ENDIF #IF (!npc.isFaceVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#npc.setFaceVirgin(1)]ifies [npc.namePos], restoring mental innocence and oral virginity! #ENDIF #IF (!npc.isAssVirgin()) #THEN
Eternal Virgin [#npc.setAssVirgin(1)]ifies [npc.namePos], restring mental innocence and anal virginity! #ENDIF
